mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from qna

select * from ( SELECT NO, ROWNUM as rNo, p_NO as pNo, g_no as gNo, LPAD(' ', 2* (LEVEL-1)) || TITLE as title, m.id, writedate as wDate, hit FROM QNA q, member m where q.id=m.id START WITH P_NO is null CONNECT BY PRIOR NO = P_NO order SIBLINGS by g_no desc) where rno BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
